entry.title: Big chance to meet Tony in the flesh @EthereumDenver
entry.summary:
Big chance to meet Tony in the flesh @EthereumDenver
DappaDan (🤙🏾,😜): OMG Y`ALL I`M LITERALLY SHAKING!!! After years of watching on the sidelines at home, I just booked my trip to @EthereumDenver today. Can't wait to actually feel the chaotic good energy that I have heard so much about!

Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): The crypto industry was built by the devs 🫡 To help pay it forward, @consensus2024 is offering a limited number of dev passes to active web2, web3 and OS builders for $109 😎 That's full access to Consensus May 29-31 in Austin, TX. Apply below! https://buff.ly/48BD5C7

entry.title: RT Derked: I've spent the last week or so diving heavily into the Solana development eco. I've found docs around things I've wanted to do pretty spars...
entry.summary: RT Derked I've spent the last week or so diving heavily into the Solana development eco. I've found docs around things I've wanted to do pretty sparse in some places, so I've started to compile a repo with practical examples and some notes.
